summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Mother Natural Admin Dashboard. All requested features are working correctly including admin login, stat card navigation, settings dialog, Services CRUD, Retreats CRUD, and tab switching.

issues: ESLint warnings for missing dependencies in useEffect hooks (defaultContractTemplates, defaultServices, defaultRetreats) - minor, does not affect functionality

critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings in AdminPage.js, AppointmentsPage.js, RetreatsPage.js for missing useEffect dependencies - consider moving default data outside component or using useMemo
context_for_next_testing_agent: All admin dashboard features tested and working. Data persists to localStorage. Admin credentials: admin@mothernatural.com / Aniyah13

admin_login.details: Admin login with credentials admin@mothernatural.com / Aniyah13 works correctly

stat_cards_navigation.details: All 4 stat cards (Products, Users, Appointments, Retreats) are clickable and navigate to correct tabs

settings_dialog.details: Settings button opens dialog with business name, contact email, phone, notifications fields. Save works correctly

services_crud.details: Add, Edit, Delete services all work correctly with proper toast notifications and localStorage persistence

retreats_crud.details: Add, Edit, Delete retreats all work correctly with proper toast notifications and localStorage persistence

appointments_tab.details: Appointments tab shows empty state message when no appointments exist

community_tab.details: Community tab shows empty state message when no posts exist

tab_switching.details: All 10 tabs (Products, Services, Retreats, Orders, Appointments, Emergency, Community, Fundraisers, Contracts, Users) switch correctly

responsive_design.details: Mobile view works correctly with responsive stat cards and scrollable tabs

mocked_apis_list: All data persistence uses browser localStorage - no backend APIs
